channel.title: Procreate on Hylu Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Procreate on Hylu Blog

item.title: Some Casual Art
item.description: I’ve been trying to get into the habit of drawing casually as opposed to doing so as part of some contest or project. Part of that is just drawing what I feel in the moment. I’m not intending to follow any style but at the same time I’m not stopping myself from easing any habits which resulted with a few pictures that do share a style. I always felt with drawing that I have no clue what my style is.
